text: 5.8 Lo 16.3, Mat 16.6, 16.12, Luk 12.1 Anɨb ak tek, chɨn binɨb kɨli ñɨn awl tap gɨlɨtep gɨl mɨñmɨñ gɨpal tek gɨnɨgun. Binɨb kɨli ñɨn awl gɨnɨg, yis nedil dɨyokɨpal tek, chɨn tap si tap tɨmel mɨdupsek dɨyokɨl, tap tɨmel keke gɨpun adek anɨb okok dɨyokɨnɨgun. Pen gos teplep pal ak sek, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak sek kɨdek gɨnɨgun. Anɨgɨnɨgabun ak, bilet yis sek ma mɨdeb tek yenɨgabun.
